Select your Courses from the list below. You can search for your Courses by entering the couse name, number or status in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Courses are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Courses.

Search for Courses included in this Folder. These courses can be public Pinnacle courses and Company In-house courses. New Public and In-house Courses are added by trainers. Click the Course name below to edit the course options.
Grade Homework
Course / Trainer
Rank / Seq
COURSE NAME: Enter a name for the course and related information. Required fields are indicated with the gold check mark.
COURSE DESCRIPTION: Enter a short description for the Course Catalog and a detailed description below for more information.

Enter a Detailed Description including the course requirements, goals, materials, and grading policy. Your descriptions can be professionally formatted with the editor below that has functionality similar to Microsoft Word.
COURSE CATEGORY: Click the "Select Category" button below to assign this new course to a specific category. The category name will be displayed after the new course is added.
This course can be part of a series of courses. Specify the first course # as the series number for all related courses. Specify the order of the related courses as the sequence.

COURSE GRADE: If this course has lesson quizes -- specify a course passing grade. You can specify the weight of each lesson quiz towards the final course grade. Specify the number of credits for this completed course. Specify the Exam # (AssessmentID) and the exam weighting towards the final grade if applicable.
COURSE LESSONS: Enter up to 15 Lesson titles for this new course. More Lessons can be added later.

You can search for your Courses by entering the couse name, number or status in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 Courses are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional Courses. To edit course name and description -- click course name. To edit course lessons -- click "Lessons".
Click Stars to view member ratings.
Check the desired lessons to copy with the new copied course. The Course description, cetificate, all selected lessons, and corresponding quiz introductions, questions and choices will be copied.
